mapper.select: SELECT A.id, A.platform_type, COALESCE(C.name, "") AS platform_type_name, A.media_name, A.bundle_ids, COALESCE(B.adspot_cnt, 0) AS adspot_cnt, A.status FROM media A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT media_id, count(id) AS adspot_cnt FROM adspot GROUP BY media_id ) B ON A.id = B.media_id LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT value, name FROM system_code WHERE code_type_id = 1 AND status = 1 ) C ON A.platform_type = C.value WHERE A.id = #{mediaId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO media (platform_type, media_name, bundle_ids) VALUES (#{platformType}, #{mediaName}, #{bundleName})
mapper.update: UPDATE media SET mark_delete = 1, status = 0 WHERE id = #{mediaId}
UPDATE ssp_adspot SET status = 0, closed_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE media_id = #{mediaId}
